title: What Does the Term “Snow Bunny” Mean?

steps.title: The term may refer to a new skier, especially an attractive female skier.
steps.content: The term may refer to a new skier, especially an attractive female skier. The term may also be used to refer to a beginner snowboarder. The first recorded use of this phrase occurred in 1953 . [3] X Research source

steps.title: In AAVE, the term may refer to a white woman who dates Black men.
steps.content: In AAVE, the term may refer to a white woman who dates Black men. Over the course of the last couple decades, the term “snow bunny” garnered a new meaning in AAVE (African American Vernacular English): the phrase is sometimes use to mean an attractive white woman, or a white woman who is attracted to or dating a Black man. [4] X Research source The term may be seen as derogatory or fetishistic in this context. This usage of "snow bunny" has been featured in literature and plays as well as in song lyrics by rappers Gunna, YG, Future, Juicy J, and more. The term “snow bunny” may also refer to a sexually promiscuous white woman or a white woman generally.
